snippet.title: Cops arrest man over Ashwood death
snippet.content: HOMICIDE detectives have arrested a man following a suspicious death in Ashwood last night. Emergency services were called to the Murra Court address about 8.40pm. The male victim has not been formally identified and the circumstances surrounding his death are yet to be determined. A 45-year-old Ashwood man was taken into custody by detectives at an address in Lenna Court, Chadstone about 3.50am this morning. Victoria Police spokesman Alistair Parsons said the man was currently assisting police with their inquiries and the investigation was ongoing.
